mapper.select: SELECT b.blog_id, b.blog_name, b.created_on, p.post_id as post_post_id, p.title as post_title, p.content as post_content, p.created_on as post_created_on FROM blog b left outer join post p on b.blog_id=p.blog_id WHERE b.BLOG_ID=#{blogId}
